name: PKT
description: PKT creates an economic incentive for people to scale and maintain physical bandwidth infrastructure worldwide. PKT uses the world's first bandwidth-hard proof of work called PacketCrypt. The resulting PKT Network is a high speed, robust data network that improves data transmission speed, latency and lowers costs for access to the internet via mesh networking. PKT is growing to become the worldâ€™s largest ISP owned and operated by the people who use it.
